vote.title: Authorize a professional engineering services contract with Criado & Associates, LLC., formerly known as Criado & Associates, Inc., for preliminary engineering, environmental assessment, and final engineering/design services for pedestrian improvements to include sidewalks and curb ramps in various locations at and around the Dallas Zoo Dallas Area Rapid Transit (DART) Station/Southern Gateway Public Green and system connections to the Perot Museum/Klyde Warren Park - Not to exceed $650,005.65 - Financing: Dallas Zoo DART Station at Southern Gateway Public Green Fund ($360,000.00) and General Fund ($290,005.65)
